summary:
Gilmore’s parents are my new favourite NPCs. Loving, living families in DnD? It’s more likely than you think. 
I do wanna know...
body:
Gilmore’s parents are my new favourite NPCs. Loving, living families in DnD? It’s more likely than you think.

I do wanna know why he so rarely goes home, though, when he could just teleport over there any time. Goddamnit I would pay for Gilmore’s full backstory. How did this incredibly powerful sorcerer grow up in a “one-camel town” and somehow become a prominent enchanter on another continent? And between those two points, he somehow learned enough about fighting to survive a duel with a dragon? WHAT IS YOUR STORY SHAUN?

How did this incredibly powerful sorcerer grow up in a “one-camel town” and somehow become a prominent enchanter on another continent? And between those two points, he somehow learned enough about fighting to survive a duel with a dragon? WHAT IS YOUR STORY SHAUN?

I do wanna know why he so rarely goes home, though, when he could just teleport over there any time. Goddamnit I would pay for Gilmore’s full backstory. How did this incredibly powerful sorcerer grow up in a “one-camel town” and somehow become a prominent enchanter on another continent? And between those two points, he somehow learned enough about fighting to survive a duel with a dragon? WHAT IS YOUR STORY SHAUN?

I do wanna know why he so rarely goes home, though, when he could just teleport over there any time. Goddamnit I would pay for Gilmore’s full backstory. How did this incredibly powerful sorcerer grow up in a “one-camel town” and somehow become a prominent enchanter on another continent? And between those two points, he somehow learned enough about fighting to survive a duel with a dragon? WHAT IS YOUR STORY SHAUN?

Me: Kinda...

body:
My flatmate: So you finally got paid! Did you spend any money yet?
Me: Kinda...
Her: What on?
Me: A 24"x24" map of a fictional country from a D&D campaign I don't even play in.

summary: I'm thinking of selling prints for charity (100% of net profit will be donated to 826), particularly the series I'm working on...
body:
I’m thinking of selling prints for charity (100% of net profit will be donated to 826), particularly the series I’m working on that will be all of m9:

I’m estimating the prints to be 8.5x11in. $12 per one / $90 for 8

Would anyone be interested?

summary: It’s November, You Know What That Means . . .
title: It’s November, You Know What That Means . . .
body:
Ignore NaNoWriMo and do my own thing!

Projects for this month:

  • Fully plot two long stories for 2019: my Casablanca-inspired Critical Role AU and an original Sci-fi work about time travel and the inevitability of aging and death (because I’m me!)
  • Write six months worth of daily Critical Role writing prompts for my (shh) secret Critical Role writing prompt blog
  • Plan the New Year’s Critical Robin Writing Challenge
  • Finish Practice, If I Could Taste Your Love, and post Chapter 3 of Eight Kisses, Between Breaths

This is going to be a great month :)

reblog.comment:
Ignore NaNoWriMo and do my own thing!

  • Write six months worth of daily Critical Role writing prompts for my (shh) secret Critical Role writing prompt blog
  • Plan the New Year’s Critical Robin Writing Challenge
  • Finish Practice, If I Could Taste Your Love, and post Chapter 3 of Eight Kisses, Between Breaths

This is going to be a great month :)

  • Write six months worth of daily Critical Role writing prompts for my (shh) secret Critical Role writing prompt blog
  • Plan the New Year’s Critical Robin Writing Challenge
  • Finish Practice, If I Could Taste Your Love, and post Chapter 3 of Eight Kisses, Between Breaths

This is going to be a great month :)

summary: My first proper contribution to the fandom and it’s painful. Sorry, I guess??? But also I’m not sorry. I’ll upload/create this...
caption:
My first proper contribution to the fandom and it’s painful. Sorry, I guess??? But also I’m not sorry. I’ll upload/create this on other platforms if there’s demand for it!

Listen to The Death and Death of Mollymauk Tealeaf on Spotify

Tracklisting:

  1. Flowers Where Your Face Should Be by The Wonder Years
  2. Playing Dead by CHVRCHES
  3. Fineshrine by Purity Ring
  4. Graves by CHVRCHES
  5. Hearts Like Ours by The Naked and Famous
  6. Shadowplay by Joy Division
  7. Heart-Shaped Box (Cover) by Ramin Djawadi

blog.name: we-are-rogue
blog.title: we are Rogue
blog.description:
Gallery | D&D | Fiction | Theory | Practice | Iconic | Tags and Masterposts

Inspiration and resources for Rogues, the most resourceful player class and fantasy archetype of them all.

Jacks of all trades and masters of none, thieves, outlaws, rascals, scoundrels, pickpockets, cutpurses, cat burglars, bandits, con artists, assassins, infiltrators, highwaymen, spies, swashbucklers, smugglers, pirates, thugs, jesters, tricksters, skillmonkeys, specialists, factotums, and the occasional ronin: we are ROGUE.

summary: Beau started with a little more backstory. I knew I wanted someone who is a bit of a shitkicker, and who broke the law, and I...
text: Beau started with a little more backstory. I knew I wanted someone who is a bit of a shitkicker, and who broke the law, and I was like “I LIKE this extortion storyline, that’s kind of cool.” A D&D Jessica Jones is what I was going for. And then Beau’s what popped out.
source: Marisha Ray on character creation / Critical Role Q&A, MCM London Comic Con 2018

reblog.comment: Marisha Ray on character creation / Critical Role Q&A, MCM London Comic Con 2018

blog.name: rabbitafy
blog.title: Rabbit's Hutch - Commissions OPEN
blog.description:
Hey there and welcome! My name is Rabbitafy, but I also go by Rabbit, Naveen, or Navi. :)

TWITCH

Commission information

summary: Help me practice my new style!
title: Help me practice my new style!
body:
Hello there!

I’ve been trying to develop my more “cartoon-esc” style for quite some time, but I’d like a wider range of characters to inspire me to help it grow.

Here’s where you come in!

Because it’s experimental, I’m running a temporary sale on this style - meaning that this is your chance to get artwork for a very, very reasonable price!

So what are the prices, you ask? Well…

1 Cheeb - $3
2 Cheebs - $5
5 Cheebs - $10

What’s that!? FIVE pieces of artwork… for $10 USD!?

That’s right, my dears! Right now you can get FIVE commissions in this style for only $10!

All of one character, each of a different… a group shot or singular. All yours, for $10!

Estimated Time: 2 - 7 days (per piece)
Limitations: None! (Though NSFW would probably be a little weird in this style, tbh.)

Don’t miss this opportunity! Order now!

(Character featured is Beauregard from Critical Role)

Mar/Sea/C • she/her (cis) • Argentina

summary: Can we please talk about how subtley Liam showed us Vax slowly falling for Keyleth? Him thinking of her when he thought he was...
body:
Can we please talk about how subtley Liam showed us Vax slowly falling for Keyleth? Him thinking of her when he thought he was going to die, fuzzing over her after battles, the flower picking.

Jesus, this man is amazing.

tags: read the first book at least
summary: No spoilers for Campaign 1, Episode 10, I promise
body:
No spoilers for Campaign 1, Episode 10, I promise

But in the last hour of the episode, they decided to do a Q&A. Chat asked what Hogwarts houses the cast is in each, and guys. Gals. Nonbinary pals.

This was back in 2015. Then, Sam said he didn’t watch/read Harry Potter. Three years later, he STILL hasn’t!
